thread.title: Grammy Awards 2017: Camila Cabello Makes Her First Red Carpet Appearance Without Fifth Harmony
thread.title_full: Grammy Awards 2017: Camila Cabello Makes Her First Red Carpet Appearance Without Fifth Harmony

author: Jillian Ruffo
title: Grammy Awards 2017: Camila Cabello Makes Her First Red Carpet Appearance Without Fifth Harmony

organizations.name: people and entertainment weekly grammy red carpet

text:
Email John Shearer/WireImage 
Fifth Harmony fans may still be grieving over the fact that the all-girl group is now down to four â€” but Camila Cabello is celebrating her newfound solo status. Two months after leaving the group to make it on her own, the singer is making her first red carpet appearance without her former group mates, at no less a show than the Grammys. 
To watch the full PEOPLE and Entertainment Weekly Grammy Red Carpet special, tune in to the People/Entertainment Weekly Network (PEN). Go to PEOPLE.com/PEN , or download the app for Apple TV, Roku, Amazon Fire TV, Xumo, Chromecast, Xfinity, iOS and Android devices. 
The 19-year-old star, who will be presenting during the award show, showed up wearing silver bead and sequin-embellished turtle neck gown, which she paired with long, beachy waves and subtle makeup.
